ECBFinanceAPI
Table of Contents

Interface IYieldCurveParameterLoader

Namespace
ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Loaders
Assembly
ECBFinanceAPI.dll

Defines methods for loading Nelson–Siegel–Svensson (NSS) model parameters for government bond yield curves. Implementations are responsible for retrieving parameter sets for specified ratings and optional date ranges.

public interface IYieldCurveParameterLoader

Methods

GetYieldCurveNelsonSiegelSvenssonParametersAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating)

Asynchronously retrieves NSS parameters for the specified government bond nominal rating across all available dates.

Task<IEnumerable<NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters>> GetYieldCurveNelsonSiegelSvenssonParametersAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating governmentBondNominalRating)

Parameters

governmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating

The nominal rating of government bonds to retrieve parameters for.

Returns

Task<IEnumerable<NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters>>

A task that resolves to a collection of NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters instances.

GetYieldCurveNelsonSiegelSvenssonParametersAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating, DateTime, DateTime)

Asynchronously retrieves NSS parameters for the specified government bond nominal rating within the inclusive date range defined by startDate and endDate.

Task<IEnumerable<NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters>> GetYieldCurveNelsonSiegelSvenssonParametersAsync(GovernmentBondNominalRating governmentBondNominalRating, DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate)

Parameters

governmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating

The nominal rating of government bonds to retrieve parameters for.

startDate DateTime

Inclusive start date of the range to retrieve parameters for.

endDate DateTime

Inclusive end date of the range to retrieve parameters for.

Returns

Task<IEnumerable<NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters>>

A task that resolves to a collection of NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters instances within the requested date range.
